profile.name: Haja Mydeen
profile.title: Full-Stack Developer & DevOps Trainer
profile.tagline: Building Scalable Systems & Empowering Future Tech Leaders
profile.bio: I bridge the gap between complex infrastructure and intuitive code. With years of experience in Full-Stack Development, DevOps automation, and Data Analytics with Excel & Power BI, I help businesses grow and individuals master the tools of the trade.

hero.heading: Code. Deploy. Analyze.
hero.subheading: Expertise in Full-Stack, DevOps, and Data Intelligence.

about.title: About Me
about.description: I am a passionate technologist dedicated to solving problems through code and data. My journey started with web development, evolved into cloud infrastructure, and expanded into data analytics teaching. I believe in clean code, automated pipelines, and data-driven decisions.

projects.title: Cloud Dashboard Pro
projects.description: A real-time comprehensive dashboard for monitoring cloud resources.

projects.title: E-Learning Platform
projects.description: Custom LMS built for hosting DevOps and Data courses.

projects.title: Finance Tracker
projects.description: Personal finance app with Power BI integration for visualizations.

services.title: Full-Stack Development
services.description: Custom web applications built for performance and scale.

services.title: DevOps Consulting
services.description: Automate your infrastructure and deployment pipelines.

services.title: Corporate Training
services.description: Workshops on Excel, Power BI, and Cloud technologies.
